price: 100. Daar zal diep zuchten worden en en zij zullen daarin niet horen.
arabic: لَهُمۡ فِيهَا زَفِيرٞ وَهُمۡ فِيهَا لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: lahum fīhā zafīrun wahum fīhā lā yasmaʿūna
